snippet.title: THE JOYLANCER: LEGENDARY MOTOR KNIGHT -- The Art of the Knight [v1.6 Early Access Trailer]
snippet.description:
THE JOYLANCER: LEGENDARY MOTOR KNIGHT is coming in June of 2015 -- but you can play it RIGHT NOW on itch.io, Steam Early Access, or the Humble Store! get locked into the most extreme upcoming action experience you'll ever find from a team of two people!
http://a6productions.itch.io/joylancer
http://store.steampowered.com/app/315540/
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/joylancer_storefront

pick up your copy of JOYLANCER for $10 today -- experience the action early and at a lower price, and get special bonuses when the full game launches!
-----
visit our website at http://a6productions.com/ 
or consider picking up one of our many other experimental titles at our itch.io page at http://a6productions.itch.io 
-- all itch.io purchases go directly to us and help support our development financially as we approach the finish line on this game's completion!

we send our thanks to everyone who's supported us over our long journey so far-- it'll be coming to an exciting close soon enough!
